misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry. With seven past appearances, Daniel has proven himself a formidable competitor in this challenging tournament. While known for occasionally losing his temper on the course, he maintains an overall gentlemanly demeanor.

To date, Daniel has secured the coveted Hector Trophée on two occasions, demonstrating his prowess in pair play. Although the Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, he always gives his best effort when competing for the individual title.
While Daniel is not currently slated to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his fans remain hopeful for a last-minute change, eager to witness his return to the greens.
